message.body: Sunday at 5 pm we are all going to go to brave heart in hellertown for a happy hour drink for a send-off for Caitlin who is moving to Florida next Friday. Anyone who wants to come just show up! :) hope to see you there! Ps. I am telling her I'm going to take her there myself and anyone else who shows up is a surprise! ;) have a great weekend!!
Oh that's right! You lucky girl!! :) xo
Richard and I will be there on Sunday :)
Jilly! You're going with with me to brave heart sagra is closed Sundays ;)
